name: AirConditionerSounds
0:
”Alexa open Air Conditioner Sounds”
”Alexa ask Air Conditioner Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: air conditioner sounds
des:
Dive into a world of soothing ambience with Air Conditioner Sounds. Designed to bring the calming and consistent hum of air conditioning units into your space, this skill is your go-to for creating a serene environment, whether you're looking to concentrate, unwind, or drift off to sleep.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Air Conditioner Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
